tool_description: Over 1.5 million active jobs from Company Career Sites & ATS. The perfect job search API for job boards, with daily updates.
name: Active Jobs DB
title: Active Jobs DB

api_list.name: Get Jobs - (No Description)
api_list.description: Search and retrieve jobs without a job description. This is the fastest way to retrieve jobs.

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Search on the job title. Always include 'wfts.' in your search. If you don't want to search on title, please leave completely empty (remove wfts.)

optional_parameters.name: organization
optional_parameters.description:
Optionally filter on organization. For example: wfts.Apple.
Always include 'wfts.' in your search

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset allows you to paginate results. For example, if you want to retrieve 300 jobs from our api you can send 3 requests with offest 0, 100, and 20.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Filter on location. Please do not search on abbreviations like US, UK, NYC. Instead, search on full names like United States, New York, United Kingdom.**

api_list.name: Get Jobs - HTML Description
api_list.description: Search and retrieve jobs with the original HTML description as extracted from the ATS or employer career site. **By using this API you understand the risk of including 3rd party HTML on your websites and platforms.**

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset allows you to paginate results. For example, if you want to retrieve 300 jobs from our api you can send 3 requests with offest 0, 100, and 20.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Filter on location. Please do not search on abbreviations like US, UK, NYC. Instead, search on full names like United States, New York, United Kingdom.

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Search on the job title. Always include 'wfts.' in your search. If you don't want to search on title, please leave completely empty (remove wfts.)

optional_parameters.name: organization
optional_parameters.description:
Optionally filter on organization. For example: wfts.Apple.
Always include 'wfts.' in your search

api_list.name: Get Jobs - Text Description
api_list.description: Search and retrieve jobs with a plain text description. Text descriptions might contain line breaks (/n) for your convenience.

optional_parameters.name: organization
optional_parameters.description:
Optionally filter on organization. For example: wfts.Apple.
Always include 'wfts.' in your search

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Search on the job title. Always include 'wfts.' in your search. If you don't want to search on title, please leave completely empty (remove wfts.)

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Filter on location. Please do not search on abbreviations like US, UK, NYC. Instead, search on full names like United States, New York, United Kingdom.**

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset allows you to paginate results. For example, if you want to retrieve 300 jobs from our api you can send 3 requests with offest 0, 100, and 20.
